testcase.name: check the service PUT (UpdatePet) To see if status code is 200.
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def requestPut = {"id": '#(id)',"category": {"id": 1,"name": 'perro'},"name": "doggie","photoUrls": ["string"],"tags": [{"id": 1,"name": '#(tagsName)'}],"status": "available"} . passed * def responsePut = read('classpath:Karate/request/pet/03_UpdatePet/responsePut.json') . passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed And request requestPut .................................................... passed When method PUT ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responsePut ......................................... passed

testcase.name: Update a pet with invalid category ID
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def requestPut = {"id": '#(id)',"category": {"id": 1,"name": 'perro'},"name": "doggie","photoUrls": ["string"],"tags": [{"id": 1,"name": '#(tagsName)'}],"status": "available"} . passed * def responsePut = read('classpath:Karate/request/pet/03_UpdatePet/responsePut.json') . passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed And request requestPut .................................................... passed When method PUT ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responsePut ......................................... passed * url url ................................................................. passed * def requestPut = {"id": '#(id)',"category": {"id": 1,"name": 'perro'},"name": "doggie","photoUrls": ["string"],"tags": [{"id": 1,"name": '#(tagsName)'}],"status": "available"} . passed * def requestPut = {"id": '#(id)',"category": {"id": 1,"name": 'perro'},"name": "doggie","photoUrls": ["string"],"tags": [{"id": 1,"name": '#(tagsName)'}],"status": "available"} . passed * set requestPut.category.id = "@$#%&" .................................... passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed And request requestPut .................................................... passed When method PUT ........................................................... passed Then status 500 ........................................................... passed
